Our mission

Merapar Technologies is to become the trusted software services company for European providers in media, telecom and technology, delivering high-end software services including cloud-based solutions and development.

AWS Consulting Partner

Merapar has achieved the AWS Consulting Partner status. This means we're now part of the AWS Partner Network and we have a team of AWS certified developers and architects on board. This is a great milestone for Merapar and provides our customers with the best of both worlds: the assurance of using Amazon Web Services, the nr. 1 Cloud Technology Provider, and Merapar's proven track record in building scalable, flexible and cost effective solutions.
